FuncDef: The display srv6-te policy source-sid command displays details about the End and End.X SIDs collected from the IS-IS LSDB after fault detection is enabled for one or more SRv6 TE Policies. The details include the IS-IS process and level information about the SIDs.
CLIs: display srv6-te policy source-sid [ <sid-value> | end | end-x ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the SID value.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check details about the End and End.X SIDs collected from the IS-IS LSDB after fault detection is enabled for one or more SRv6 TE Policies, run the display srv6-te policy source-sid command. The details include the IS-IS process and level information about the SIDs.
SID details can be queried after fault detection is enabled or within one hour after fault detection is disabled.
